chapters.title: Chapter 10:  A Saying in the Borderlands
chapters.info: Bael, p. 193 (264)—Clan chief of the Goshien Aiel. He is the tallest man Rand has ever met, almost a head taller than Rand, who is not short. He has deep, resonant voice. He has two wives: Dorindha, and Melaine. Melaine and Bael were recently wed, after Dorindha agreed to accept Melaine as a sister-wife. He has three sons (by Dorindha), and is expecting twin daughters (by Melaine). See also Dorindha; Melaine.
